title: SMC_GetObjFromHistory (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_GetObjFromHistory : POINTER TO SMC_GEOINFO
Returns an object that has been deleted but not yet overwritten.
For
N
>=
0,
SMC_GetObjFromHistory(poq,
N)
=
SMC_GetObj(poq,
N)
.
For negative
N
, the objects from the history are retrieved.
(
N=-1
gets the newest object from history,
smaller
N
get older elements).
The valid range for
N
is
-SMC_GetHistoryCount(poq)
...
SMC_GetCount(poq)
-
1
.
task-safety: call from consumer task only

rows: Index of the object, counting is started withN=0
